      • StorageLogic

    • Method Detail

      • loadIndexes

        public void loadIndexes()
        EXPERIMENTAL -- Loads indexes into memory for easy and fast access.

        Will also be updated if in memory. Might want do decide which way to go, either memory or getting it via FIO.

      • storeIndexes

        public void storeIndexes()
        EXPERIMENTAL -- When done using the storage logic, they are released and written back to disk.

        Updates the indexes if they are not current already, removes indexes from memory.

      • retrieveItem

        public void retrieveItem()
        Finds an item in storage and returns it.

        Depending on the kind of item, and if it exists in the storage, it will be retrieved and returned to the caller.

        Parameters:
        Itemtype - The Type of Item will affect how this method retrieves it. *
        Name - The identifier for an item. Will find where it is stored, and return the corresponding item.

      • putItem

        public void putItem()
        Puts an item of a specific type into the storage of the node.

        Depending on the type of item, it will be handled and stored in the correct spot.

        Parameters:
        Itemtype - The Type of Item will affect how this method retrieves it.
        Item - The Item itself.

      • store_passToNeighbors

        public void store_passToNeighbors()
        EXPERIMENTAL

        If an item is in this node's storage, it must also be in it's neighbors storage. Puts an item of a specific type into the storage of the node. Generate PUT RPCs for the relevant neighbors.

        Parameters:
        Itemtype - The Type of Item will affect how this method retrieves it.
        Item - The Item itself.
